lemma no_nonce_NS1_NS2 [rule_format]: "evs \<in> ns_public \<Longrightarrow> Crypt (pubEK C) \<lbrace>NA', Nonce NA\<rbrace> \<in> parts (knows Spy evs) \<longrightarrow> Crypt (pubEK B) \<lbrace>Nonce NA, Agent A\<rbrace> \<in> parts (knows Spy evs) \<longrightarrow> Nonce NA \<in> analz (knows Spy evs)"
